website_summaries.verdict: A complete set that includes a wide range of bits and plenty of extras. Can service the iPhone 7.
pros: Large set that includes 58 bits, antistatic wrist strap, several tweezers and several tools for getting into tight spots
All bits for the tricky iPhone 7 included
Better quality tools than its competitors
cons: Case doesn’t hold tools securely, so they move around and fall out easily
Bits and driver could have more magnetic strength

customer_reviews.title: Great tool kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit because I constantly am building computers or repairing them and I was needing a larger spectrum of small head screw tips. This kit has a very very good range of bits that make the little jobs very easy. Only complaint I have is that I wish the magnet head was just a tad more powerful as it can barely hold any screws already that are being pulled from a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kit helped repair my watch
customer_reviews.text: I had a watch that the watch repair shop said was not repairable. I already had a precision screwdriver kit that could remove the main screws but did not have the tools to go further. This kit had exactly what I needed in term of flat pry tools, tweezers, screwdrivers etc to repair my watch. I'm betting it will be even better than the clumsy tools I used last time when it comes time to replace my iPhone battery again. This kit was worth every penny, not to mention it was delivered same day when I ordered it and I had the watch repair done that same evening.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cottrell , Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great toolkit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set. This kit has every tool I will ever need and more. The case is sturdy and helps to keep everything in place. My one complaint is that there are not enough pouches to fit all the tools but that is minor. I have not had any issues with tools spinning or getting loose at this point. So far I am very pleased with the set.
customer_reviews.author: b. senn

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Excellent tool set! Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This kit works great. It has a great multi-bit screwdriver set and the various prying tools work well for all sorts of repairs. The quality is pretty good and it does great with cell phone repairs and computer component repairs. I work on computer motherboards and other various electronic devices. This set is great. The case is compact and works for what it offers. I would recommend this kit to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Americo Garcia Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A techs best friend
customer_reviews.text: I'm a cell phone tech. I do a lot of repairs in the course of a day, and sometimes I have to be on the go. This set is great for that. The tools are high quality and has everything you need to take apart any electric device. I use it for my phone's, laptops, home PC, and my gaming consoles.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Great Toolkit. Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is without a doubt the best computer toolkit I have ever purchased. Very handy too have, well organized and well packaged. I used it mostly for working on laptops, but would work equally well on desktops or other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Liz968

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase, would recommend to everyone that uses tools!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on-time, I loaned it to a few friends who were doing computer, phone, eyeglass, etc. repair, they loved it so much that they had me send them the link to buy one for themselves and even for gifts. Bottom line is, the tool kit is useful for many projects needing small drivers to pry tools. Excellent purchase, would recommend to everyone that uses tools!
customer_reviews.author: T-Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Once in a lifetime purchase!  Everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: Great set! A once in a lifetime purchase, has everything you need to work on PCs, electronics and any small scale situations. The handle is solid, as are the tweezers and spades. My only complaint is that the retractable razor is a little flimsy, but overall I feel this kit is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DHL!

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a chance to use the tool case, and im very satisfied with it! The steel is solid, and comes in lots of varieties, it has shapes for almost any electronic. The only downside is that the plastic wedges are very soft and will bend and break if used with too much force, but the can easily be replaced with stronger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much to say, it's a great set of tools, and the package is nice. One issue I have though, is the metal yools for separating seems, they're not smooth enough. I tried to peel apart a laptop, and I could tell it was scratching it, not just separating it. I feel this shouldn't have to be the case, but that's my only complaint. I still say it's a great set of tools, well organized and packaged. Don't have to worry about losing anything.
customer_reviews.author: ACE7F22

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set! Very pro like. Got these for my teen son who wants to fix computers and game consoles for a living. GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.author: Scott Burchard

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, nicely designed. Love the color. I bought it primarily since my regular screwdrivers don't get as good as a grip and I'm a big fan of my toolset at work and these are even better.
customer_reviews.author: Ardy Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set! I used it to add a cooler to my GPU and it worked very well! The screwdriver set is very good quality, which was the biggest concern for me. The pouch is very helpful for keeping it all organized. I would definitely recommend this set to anyone looking for an inexpensive set for doing work on a computer.
customer_reviews.author: CDH

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding computer/electronics toolkit!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing kit. Was an absolute sanity saver with recent laptop upgrades. My spouse was very thankful for the stress free updates that this kit made possible.... All the tools are well made and useful. Not a junk tool in the set. And I love the roll up bag and plastic locking bit box. These keep everything near and organized and ready for use. I cannot say enough how much I love this kit. I would buy another in a heartbeat if needed.
customer_reviews.author: judith d rhodes

customer_reviews.title: We have a wii u and two very ornery ferrets that love to explore and one got in my sons room ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had to throw away electronics because I couldn't get in them to fix them. We have a wii u and two very ornery ferrets that love to explore and one got in my sons room and tipped his drink all over on the wii tablet and it didn't work properly after that I looked everywhere for a tool or just another tablet to buy but nintendo don't sell tablets separately. and I couldn't find the right tool until this little gem came along. Now I'm fixing all kinds of things! I LOVE this. And its worth every penny! Great JOB Oria!
customer_reviews.author: KATHI

customer_reviews.title: Great kit helped me replace my G751J battery which was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit helped me replace my G751J battery which was not for the faint of heart to try on a 2k laptop. Saved me 600 dollars because Asus wanted 650 to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Really good kit.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this kit. It seems to have everything you need. Much better than the ones I've previously bought. It has real metal screw drivers. Not the cheap plastic ones that are sent with some screens. Thanks for the great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy little tool bag that everyone should have. We are constantly in need of smaller tools, and the bag keeps everything organized and together.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: This will be your favorite set of tools for computer work
customer_reviews.text: For those teeny-tiny screws, this will be your go-to set of tools. The screwdrivers are excellent quality, and the assortment of bits is impressive. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: MRE

customer_reviews.title: Overall good set
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a pretty good tool set. I've taken apart a few laptops at work and haven't run into any functionality problems. The biggest drawback so far is plastic tray inside the plastic case that holds all the bits and screwdriver. The tray is made of very thin and flexible plastic that I could probably tear without much force. If it was replaced with something a bit more rigid/durable, this would be a 5 star set for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Future Flashback

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set that has everything I needed to complete repairs on several devices (Galaxy Note 10.1 screen replacement, Nintendo 3ds Motherboard replacement). Very nice quality. An amazing value. Would recommend to anyone needing to do electronics repair.
customer_reviews.author: J Hice

customer_reviews.title: He seems happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. He was always using my set from another manufacturer, and forgetting to give them back. He seems happy with it, has not complained about the set. He uses it for his computer and other electronic items he likes to take apart and fix
customer_reviews.author: Drewster

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED: Not that good for everyday... cheap metal tips,,, broke one tip first day
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be good, however, a tip broke on me. I wasn't using so much pressure, but it just broke. I don't think they use quality metals. You get what you pay for... Just be aware that it might no be a tool set for everyday use. UPDATE: I just receved an email from seller that They'll refund my money. I would say that even with the small issue i described this has ben a pleasant transaction and that I appretiate the responsabilit the seller takes on their product. Dont now if this was pat of a bad batch, but at least they made things right.
customer_reviews.author: Odiseuz

customer_reviews.title: P2 0.8 stripped on first use
customer_reviews.text: I needed ONE specific bit for P2 0.8 (antenna bar on new macbooks). I ordered this kit because it seemed like a great deal and I could round out my toolset with a few more. The P2 stripped on literally the first screw. Not the screw, the BIT stripped so I can't even try to use it on any more screws. Waste of money. I was surprised because the tools look to be decent quality and using some of the bigger bits worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Flinlock

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with every single thing you need.
customer_reviews.text: The tool kit is nice. Quality is good. The tools all do what they are supposed to do. Two comments. 1. There are two loose screwdriver bits just hanging out in the driver case with no spot to go, they just rattle around everywhere. The rest of the bits have a nice ordering tray that tells you what size and shape they are for easy organization. Also if you are buying this kit to fix iPhone 7 and up or Applewatch you want to watch out. It does not come with the Y000 screw tri-tip bit that is needed to properly repair these devices. Make sure that you find a kit that does have it or buy it separate.
customer_reviews.author: zachary

customer_reviews.title: Has the tools you need, but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Kit has the tools you need, but looks and feels cheap. It did not arrive like the photo which may or may not be what you want, Personally, the pockets seem to fit the tools so I would've preferred to receive it like the photo instead of having to put everything in each pocket myself. Also, all of the bits in the box are set in cheap, flimsy plastic holders. This really worries me because all organization will be lost once of these cracks or bends out of shape. Regarding the kit itself, it does seem to have everything I need for electronics. I was able to work on a video doorbell, watch, and also some small electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality. I though by spending 30 bucks that it would be better than the 15 dollar ones, but I am almost 100 percent sure the cheaper ones are the same exact thing with a different label. Just get the cheaper ones, no benefit paying more.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Most of the components of this set are VERY nice. The screwdriver set is good
customer_reviews.text: Most of the components of this set are VERY nice. The screwdriver set is good, as are the tweezers and plastic pry bars. The metal spudgers leaves something to bed desired, but over all this is a very nice kit, and I have purchased multiple.
customer_reviews.author: William Houston

customer_reviews.title: Good For Small Jobs
customer_reviews.text: I have had great success with this on smaller "around the house" items. I have to say that it does not do well in the shop. First of all just throw the angle piece out. After a slight turn on a screw the entire piece came apart. I have also sheared off two of the heads trying to pull older screws out. I highly recommend this if you want a screwdriver set that has all the heads you can possibly imagine. Every time I see something weird around the house, this set has a bit for it. Do not buy this for anything you will need to put some torque on.
customer_reviews.author: The Noodle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool set and Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool set for electronics, Its a great addition to my regular “traditional” tool kit since it has everything I would need packaged together instead of buying everything separate. Everything seems quality and not cheap plastic, Only complaint would be the screwdriver bit case seems a bit cheap and fragile, other than that everything seems fine.Had a defective item when I first received it, Seller was extremely kind and helpful trying their best even as I was being rude due to annoyance of a previous order from a different seller. A+ Customer service, would buy from again
customer_reviews.author: Joesph

customer_reviews.title: Bent Shaft
customer_reviews.text: The extendable and flexible shaft both have end that are not perfectly straight causing a wobble when in use. This product is still a great deal, but I'm rather displeased by this imperfection given that the whole kit is designed for precision as is implied by the product title. The metal spudgers feel solid, but the tips of each are either too rounded or squared making them no better than a flathead screw driver for getting in the gaps of plastic laptop bodies.
customer_reviews.author: ASBaumgarten

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this set for quite a long time now, so far ,so good.
customer_reviews.text: This set saved me more than once when trying to fix stuff I didn't find a screwdriver for them! I keep it as one of my personal tools, so my big kid and husband don't mess with it LOL.. Pieces are good, and it might be kind of different at first but they are so useful! A lovely mini-kit. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela A.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for electronic techs who need a potpourri of tools
customer_reviews.text: Loving this kit! It has almost anything you needs when working with most electronics. It’s packed full of tools for whatever your job may be. It’s easy to throw it in your tool box or bag. Not too heavy, but not cheaply made. I mean it could be a bit stronger, but I haven’t broken anything....yet, while using it.
customer_reviews.author: warramq

customer_reviews.title: Once you put all items in the right place it looks like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I had originally thought the article would arrive as depicted, but no such luck. Would be nice if it stated "some assembly required" or some such. That said, once you place all the items in the right place, it looks like what you seen in the picture. And, overall, it is serving me well.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Grefer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I started working on laptops for fun and I have been very surprised by how well this kit has served me. The bits have not shown any wear, even after some of them have been used to break very tightly wound bolts and screws. The variety fits all needs for most home small electronics repairs.
customer_reviews.author: K F

customer_reviews.title: It contains many bits
customer_reviews.text: Its great that it has so many bits, the disappointing part is the screw driver is not magnetic where you put the bit in. The only magnetic piece is the extending rod. I have a hard time using a complicated screwdriver. It is easier for me to just pop the bit in and it be held in place. I will be purchasing another brand. I won't be using this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jerylin H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. The screwdriver set was well worth the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. The screwdriver set was well worth the price alone, except for the storage case is poorly designed - very flimsy plastic tray and the outer enclosure does not clasp well at all - but a simple rubber band does the trick to keep it secure. Also some of the plastic pry tools are pretty much disposable after one use, but the rest of this kit of precision tools is very nice, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Should be a solid, affordable kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit should more than server what i need. I work on desktop and laptop computers with the very rare need to operate on a cellphone or tablet. I bought this as part of my tech field pack that's a grab n go tech support kit. Haven't done much more than unwrapped and put everything into this various pouches at this point. Screwdriver set seems fairly robust for all the bits and the flexible extension.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Carrell

customer_reviews.title: No magnetic anymore - not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: There must have been a little magnet wedged inside and fell out - so I basically have this kit with all these different attachments that won't stay in. Super disappointed, have used just a few times. Save you money and buy something that will last from a name brand instead of a cheap unknown.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dalluge

customer_reviews.title: Great value, decent tools
customer_reviews.text: I like the tools so far, but have a couple of gripes. First, the tools aside from the driver set are all thrown together from bulk, cheap single items to make the kit, and do not all have the same level of quality. Second, In following the product image exactly, I placed the ruler in its rightful spot, but with significant resistance - the pocket seems to have been stitched incorrectly and tore slightly as the bag is of cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Equilibrium

customer_reviews.title: ORIA Computer Repair Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous Product. ALL of the useful and needed tools for Computer Repair & Maintenance. ALL in one place and one kit. Very Impressive Kit. Have already used it on a Hard Drive. And all those Teeny Tiny and Special Head Screws. Love This Kit. SO Easy to Select & Use the right 'screwdriver bit'. Very Ergonomic Tool.
customer_reviews.author: OLDEESTUNES

customer_reviews.title: The plastic tools all seem fine but the screwdriver bits and the rubber pieces that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of its basically a knock-off I -Fix-It set. And that's about what you get. The plastic tools all seem fine but the screwdriver bits and the rubber pieces that hold them could be better. The rubber pieces do not tightly hold the bits so they just flop around in the case and it's only a matter of time before I lose one. But, I like the number of bits and I can just be careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: jared stanley

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit that backs a punch. Come with any bit you can think of and more. I've used this for many things and it never disappoints me. I wish that the thing that holds the screw driver and the bits wasn't a cheap weak plastic but other than that, I would defiantly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice For The Price
customer_reviews.text: It's not the absolute perfect tool, but everything works really good. We bought this for our son, who works as computer tech and he told me that he really likes it and he already built a complete new computer with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I received my my Oria Precision screwdriver kit. At first look, I appreciated the volume of options and use. It will take me a few months to fully evaluated the screwdriver kit. I will use it for various jobs besides my computer. Thank you for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I returned it almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor quality. The manufacturer could be considered worthy of prosecution for violating some statute on wasting natural resources.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was solid plastic and could hold all the screws well, it appears it's made of some rubber, and could fall some where easily and hard to find. [updata] After a few month use, i find that the rubber design is not bad, since you can take that set out and easy change the driver bits, no need to open the whole box.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Above average, EXCELLENT  screw-driver set!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the screw driver set. Today everyone uses battery powered screwguns. Not every task calls for that much power or torque. Some things require finesse and precision and this set makes those tasks achievable. I live thus set!!! I WOULD recommend this to anyone thinking of buying one. Not only a screw-driver set, it also comes with other precision tools that make this buy a bargain for certain...👍👍 waaay up. Thank you Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny/Albany NY

customer_reviews.title: Must have for computer repair
customer_reviews.text: This kit has all the various screw drivers and many other tools needed. Only issue is the hard plastic case all the bits are in. once dropped, it will shatter ... wish it was a softer plastic shell that not so brittle.
customer_reviews.author: WoodstockDan

customer_reviews.title: NiCE TOOL SET
customer_reviews.text: For all my pc or tablet builds or repairs this repair kit its very very handy. And very well organized
customer_reviews.author: Ale Tezu

customer_reviews.title: SUPER TOOL KIT - TREMENDOUS PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This small tool kit is without question one of the nicest all around packages you will ever find... and at an exceptional price point. LIGHT DUTY ONLY. Great for computers, cell phones, lap-tops etc. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Watza Matta U?

customer_reviews.title: Pretty complete set
customer_reviews.text: Pretty complete set. I'd prefer some non plated bits, since the plating chrome or what ever its is is highly likely to chip and cause a poor fit. The spudgers worked, but I noticed they lost a bit of material while attempting to remove the screen from an iPod.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good, not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The kit works great so far. Repaired a photography lens just fine with it. Although I would like to add that the magnetic parts are not that strong and the extension arm has no locking ability so if you turn it upside down it can/will fall out of the screwdriver extension socket.
customer_reviews.author: Nightforce2

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The first screw that was hard to get out the bit bent and broke. It's good for light use, but if you have a screw that has any touque grab another screw driver
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: very nice kit
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the nicest things I have bought for myself in a while and it has saved me money twice as it helped me repair a couple of items. I now have confidence and the tools to try and take apart my camera and replace the screen.
customer_reviews.author: MRHULOT

customer_reviews.title: Not really sold on the overall quality to date.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used these a lot so judging them at this date could well be premature.....but so far the quality seems to be loose on the tolerances and the metallurgy seems less than great.
customer_reviews.author: TR250

customer_reviews.title: great mix of bits and tools for electronic repairs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit, has all the items i may need to do my electronic repairs. even had the bits needed to repair my trucks electronics. i would have given it a 5 star but the pouch had a minor defect where i could not insert the ruler into the pouch pocket. but given my usage the only thing i need a ruler for is scale in photos so not a big deal. otherwise best kit for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. White

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband as a gift and he loves it. It’s equivalent to the iFixit tool kit but at a better price. He loves it. His one compliant is the holding case—it’s made out a cheaper plastic but still a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: KateL

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools for Computer work!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of mini tools for computer work. Only problem I had was it comes with some assembly required. All of the tools ar packaged loose, and you have to figure out where they all go. I had to,go,back,on line to find a photo for reference, otherwise I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Handley

customer_reviews.title: Handy Tools
customer_reviews.text: I love that I have my own set of screwdrivers - now I can repair minor things at work or at home.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, not as good as I fix it
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra precision kit to keep at work so my I Fix It bits would stop running off my desk... of the price that I paid I'm very happy with the kit. The build quality of the driver is not as good but over all I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J.

customer_reviews.title: Screwdriver set, that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the set I received, I purchased this for the purpose of computer assembly and small electronics repair. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: woodk9

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with it .
customer_reviews.text: I used that Tool Kit to change the screen on my laptop and I'm very happy with these tools, and I also changed the battery on my Kindle, it made the jobs easy for me. I recommend that Tool Kit .
customer_reviews.author: MARCUS

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for All Electronics
customer_reviews.text: Works great with all the electronics you have. You can trust it has every bit you could need, and you’d be hard-pressed to find a set with better value.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: The screwdriver kit is useless. The extension bar broke first thing out of the box, making the whole screwdriver kit unusable. So I went and bought an iFixit Kit. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: My order was defective and ORIA was very attentive, quickly offering me a refund. I have to commend them for their attention to customer service and satisfaction. And they do offer on all ORIA products a 60-day money back and 1-year warranty. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable
customer_reviews.text: It's better than I expected for the price. Has so many tips and accessories. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: RossRoss

customer_reviews.title: What a Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a compact set for on-the-go mobile repairs and after some research this is where i ended up. Very happy with the quality and variety of tools included and the quality of the case itself. Great addition to my collection and i will be purchasing another for my home workstation.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Must have set.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a must have if you like to open up your computer, laptop, phones, etc to make repairs or upgrades. it comes with every thing you need. I only wish the screwdriver had stronger magnet. When you have to work on some IMac its tough since some of those apple products have magnet inside them.
customer_reviews.author: Imperium

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the six inch ruler does not fit flush in any pocket and can tell that if forced it will easily tear said pocket. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice electronics repair kit
customer_reviews.text: I needed some specialized bits and a driver that would fit in tight places and this worked perfectly. Having the spungers was helpful too
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: All the tools work well. The screwdriver extends, which is unexpected and great. The ruler doesn't seem to fit anywhere except behind the toolbox, bit that isn't an issue. The kit is easy to grab, and is very handy to have everything on one place.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cynical

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically to use on iPhone 7/7 plus but the tri-wing screw driver they claim to fit did not because it was too big to fit into the screws. Had to return and buy a different set.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Computer Hardware repair
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for PC's, iPad's, and Chrome Books by several manufacturers and have always had the right tool.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Kit has all you need for small electronic repairs
customer_reviews.text: The kit was more than I expected for the price. It contained all the tools that I needed to repair an Apple laptop. It will be a much needed addition to my tools for repairing small electronics. Can't say enough good about this tool kit. Great buy for great quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: DrDavid

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my drone parts and other small items .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for small devices!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Keeps everything tidy and organized. Has many tools for computers, cell phones, small devices. The screwdriver is magnetized which helps with all those tiny screws in devices. I was able to change my cell phone screen with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Y I didnt get this before indont know... love everything in it an have already used it many times..
customer_reviews.author: MrE Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Great price for selection...
customer_reviews.text: Like the wide selection of choice...bought for eye glass repair specifically. Hopefully it will be useful for electronic repairs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of bits and the accessories. Cool tool very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit! Has everything I need or probably ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit! Has everything I need or probably ever will need! I kinda wish the screwdriver kit had something a little more permanent than plastic to hold all the bits, but it gets the job done. ll in all a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ewer

customer_reviews.title: Great toolkit for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this toolkit. I bought it especially for making repairs on my DELL laptop. It has all all the tools I need and then some. A word of caution, the one tool you may not recognize is a retractable knife. It could draw blood while you're trying to figure out how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Old Web Guy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this product with five stars. The shipment was fast. I did receive this product. It is a great product. I would order it again. Thanks for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sama

customer_reviews.title: Great little fine tool set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tool kit. I am currently using in on a computer build, but I have used the tools for other things as well. I purchased a set of hemostats, curved and straight, to complete this tool set.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetman56

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular Kit, Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mid last year as a replacement for the hodge podge of gear that I have been using for a very long time. This kit has had EVERYTHING I have need to assist with a department wide hardware refresh which ended up with a ton of drive and ram replacements. I have recommended it to several folks and they too have been extremely happy! Cannot tout this kit enough!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel B.

customer_reviews.title: It's small problem, but it's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's Like things , simple and modernly design and useful functions.. grasp sense is tightly in my hand. It's so cool! Unlike thing is arrived result is slightly scratch in someone's product. And pocket's sweding inside storage line is poor. But, It is okay. It is personal problem things in my counrty. Thank you for selling to me.
customer_reviews.author: ugly Hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have shopped around more first. Needed a kit such as this one and it's a decent product at a decent price and has served it's purpose so far. I will be replacing this kit with a better one fairly soon.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Barry Fults

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck toolkit!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a kit so I can work on my laptop and other devices, and was NOT disappointed! Highly recommend this product. You'll have a bit for everything, extensions for getting in PC cases, and plastic inserts for opening anything you want.
customer_reviews.author: brian m.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is great tools , it is very helpful. It has all what you need to . and it is easy to store it and very easy to take it with you for any where. I just fixed my laptop with it it just great tools .
customer_reviews.author: ziad

customer_reviews.title: The tools are great, and the case is nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've been able to replace a fan on a laptop, replace the thermal paste on an Xbox 360, and replace the battery on an iphone6. The tools are great, and the case is nice and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my latest computer rebuild. Great tools for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alan kinnard

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic drivers make all the difference
customer_reviews.text: With such small screws, once they were extracted, the magnetic drivers easily held the screws until they were placed safely away. Used in conjunction with some compressed air, I was able to dust out the inside of my macbook air and it seems to be operating better. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: the flexable head was fine. that's really my only concern with this tool ...
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic tip which you are supposed to use for all your bits was machined too small and i couldn't use any of the tips. the flexable head was fine. that's really my only concern with this tool kit, everything else is very good. im only returning my product as its pretty much useless without the magnetic insert
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It has all the tools you need for small equipment work.
customer_reviews.author: SALMAN BAIG

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: I've only had a chance to use it once and it worked great. This is more for personal use versus fixing pc's for customers. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: aaa62

customer_reviews.title: Does not have the right bit for opening iPhones
customer_reviews.text: This set is a very nice addition to my collection.It comes in a very nice carrying case that keeps everything tidy and in its place.My only complaint is that it doesn't come with the proper bit for opening iPhones.Luckily I have the correct bit from other sets laying around.Looking forward to repairing many more electronics with this set.If my opinion changes with use ill report any changes.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnet
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tools! A must have for computer repairs. The only reason it’s not perfect is the magnet in the screwdriver is useless. It cannot hold screws on the bit you choose and screws fall off really easily..You have to use two hands to keep from dropping or losing them. If it wasn’t for this issue it would be a five star product.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Perez

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for reparing electronics. Works great and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: To have it for my needs
customer_reviews.text: The price and I was using it for my computer 💻 class at the time, but someone stole it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: overall it is a good choice
customer_reviews.text: I used T4,T5, unscrewed 40 or 50 screws. it is worn out already. those two are tiny ones. it may be supposed to be like this. ==update 6.22.2017==== as I said those two bits are tiny and should be used delicately. I used it in a short time to unscrew too many screws. that's probably the reason for the worn-out(still usable). other that, the whole set is very versatile. and the customer service is super.
customer_reviews.author: ella

product_meta.title: ORIA Precision Screwdriver Kit, 76 in 1 with 56 Bits Repair Tool Kit for Cellphone, Game Console, Tablet and Other Devices, Blue
feature_bullets: 【76 Full Set】: It includes 76 in 1 screwdriver set, utility knife, wrist strap, tweezers, SIM card remover, LCD suction cup, triangle plectrum, plastic spudgers, metal spudger, stainless steel ruler, which are designed for repairing most of your devices.
【High Quality & Well Performance】: ORIA screwdriver bits are made of CRV steel, whose hardness can reach to HRC52-56. Durable and functional.
【Widely Use】: Mutil-repairing hand tools for iPhone, Tablets, Laptops, PC, Smartphones, Watches, Glasses, Camera and Other Electronic Devices.
【Ergonomic Design】 : The unique driver is skidproof as well as antistatic, which makes it be held more easily and safer for a long time.
【Well Organized Nylon Bag Pack】: Easy to carry and store it at home or work.
